title: Cheesy chicken and chive sauce
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '5 skinless, boneless chicken breast fillets - cut into strips', '3 tablespoons butter', '1 clove garlic, minced', '2 tablespoons flour', '300ml double cream', '250ml full fat milk', '2 tablespoons coarse grain mustard', '60g grated Parmesan cheese', '8 tablespoons chopped fresh chives']
